input.sentences: today i stumbled upon this when i walked through my woods .
my husband and i were in shock ! this place was here the whole time .
it looks like an old aztec burial ground !
look at these crazy shaped huge rocks ! humans could n't have done this !
we walked down over a hill and found a large round rock formation sticking up out of the ground ! i am in total shock !
output.sentences: Esmerelda searched high and low for the perfect location for the next witches coven
She sent Schmule on a journey into the hinterlands.
He spotted a cirque that might be perfect.
He was crushed by the falling stones at the quarry.
Esmerelda settled on the cylindrical rock for the sacrifice.
